Indirect transmission terms in the lower part of the chain

potential_issues.issue: First narrator Abdul Rahman al-Attar is completely unknown (majhul al-ayn)
potential_issues.impact: Unknown first collector significantly undermines chain reliability from the start.

potential_issues.issue: Chain contains undocumented narrators without established reliability grades
potential_issues.impact: Ibrahim and Adam lack documented reliability assessments, weakening the chain.

potential_issues.issue: This is a mawquf Quranic interpretation, not a Prophetic statement
potential_issues.impact: The hadith represents tafsir, not a direct saying of the Prophet ﷺ.

english_translation: Narrated by Mujahid in explanation of Quranic verses.

narrators.name: Abdul Rahman
narrators.full_name: Muhammad ibn al-Husayn ibn Muhammad ibn Ja'far al-Attar al-Shayban
narrators.alternative_names: Muhammad ibn al-Husayn al-Shayban, Abu al-Fath al-Shayban

narrators.name: Ibrahim
narrators.full_name: Ibrahim ibn Fahd ibn Hakim ibn Ibrahim ibn Qudama ibn Mahan al-Saji al-Basri
narrators.alternative_names: Ibrahim ibn Fahd al-Basri, Abu Ishaq al-Saji

narrators.name: Adam
narrators.full_name: Adam ibn Abi Iyas al-Bahili
narrators.alternative_names: Adam ibn Abi Iyas

narrators.name: Warqa
narrators.full_name: Abdullah ibn Abi Warqa' al-Asadi al-Madini
narrators.alternative_names: Abdullah ibn Warqa', Abu Ishaq al-Madini

narrators.name: Ibn Abi Nijhah
narrators.full_name: Abd al-Malik ibn Abd al-Aziz ibn Abi Nijhah al-Madini
narrators.alternative_names: Abd al-Malik ibn Abi Nijhah, Abu Muslim

narrators.name: Mujahid
narrators.full_name: Mujahid ibn Jabr al-Qurashi al-Makki
narrators.alternative_names: Mujahid al-Makki, Abu al-Hajjaj
